alert.note: Alert for Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 2:12PM CDT until August 27 at 9:34PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Sucarnoochee River At Livingston affecting Sumter County. .Flooding continues on the Sucarnoochee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sucarnoochee River At Livingston. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flooding of farm lands around Livingston occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning to a crest of 19.0 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
